section_title:
16a11 - Sick and vacation pay considered
earnings under the CCPA.
text:
Sick and vacation pay are
compensation for personal services, and thus are “earnings” under the CCPA. Their
status as subject to withholding or FICA deductions is immaterial in determining
whether they constitute earnings.
html: Sick and vacation pay are compensation for personal services, and thus are “earnings” under the CCPA. Their status as subject to withholding or FICA deductions is immaterial in determining whether they constitute earnings.
